          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Ordfält</string>
            <string language="en">Ordfält</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ordfält</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ordfält</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ordfält</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ordfält</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ordfδlt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ordfält</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Klicka på fraserna för att höra dem. Du kan själv fortsätta att fylla i ordfältet med nya ord.Soltau - Modul 4.Ingår i Tyska steg 1.</string>
            <string language="en">Click on the phrases in order to consult them. You can alone continue to fulfil in the word field with new words.

Soltau - module 4.

Is included in German stages 1.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Tyska 1</string>
            <string language="sv">tyska</string>
            <string language="sv">Soltau</string>
            <string language="sv">ordfält</string>
            <string language="sv">ord</string>
            <string language="sv">ordförståelse</string>
            <string language="en">German 1</string>

            <string language="en">Soltau</string>
            <string language="en">word fields</string>
            <string language="en">words</string>
            <string language="en">word understanding</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klicken Sie an die Phrasen, um sie zu beraten. 
Sie können alleine fortfahren, im Wort zu erfüllen 
auffangen mit neuem words.Soltau - das Modul 4.Is, das in 
Deutschstadien 1 eingeschlossen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Clic sur les expressions afin de les 
consulter. Vous pouvez seul continuer à accomplir dans le 
domaine de mot avec nouveau words.Soltau - le module 4.Is inclus en 
étapes 1 d'allemand.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estale sobre as frases a fim consultá-las. 
Você pode sozinho continuar a cumprir no campo com words.Soltau
novo - módulo 4.Is da palavra incluído nos estágios 1 do alemão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scatti sopra le frasi per consultarlo. 
Potete da solo continuare a compiere nel campo con nuovo 
words.Soltau - modulo 4.Is di parola incluso in tedesco le fasi 1.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χτυπήστε στις φράσεις προκειμένου να αυτοί ερωτηθούν.
Μπορείτε μόνο να συνεχίσετε να εκπληρώνετε στο πεδίο λέξης
με τις νέες λέξεις Soltau - ενότητα 4.Is που περιλαμβάνεται 
στα γερμανικά στάδια 1.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haga clic encendido las frases para consultarlas.
Usted puede solamente continuar satisfaciendo en el campo con 
words.Soltau nuevo - módulo 4.Is de la palabra incluido en alemán 
las etapas 1.</string>
          </description>
